translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「混乱しすぎだ。陣も乱れ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's too chaotic. The formation is disrupted,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数の有利が活かせる状況ではない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the numerical advantage cannot be utilized."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 喋っているうちに、ツォトン自身の判断も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As he spoke, Zotton's own decision

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明確に固まったようだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: seemed to have firmly solidified.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「撤退するぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We will retreat!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同道できる部隊はついてこいと伝えろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tell any units that can accompany us to follow!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ははっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それで……閣下。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So then... Your Excellency.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この者どもはどうなさるのです？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What will you do with these people?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋の片隅には、手足を縛られた状態で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the corner of the room, there were about twenty people

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 牢の中に閉じ込められた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: bound by their hands and feet, locked inside a cell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 20人ほどの人々の姿があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Approximately twenty people were there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「流石にこいつらの頭脳は惜しいな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Their brains are really a waste.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍達に入れる分が必要だしな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We need to assign some to the demon generals after all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （逃げられる……か。このままじゃ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Can I escape... like this...?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぅ、とウルザはひとつ、息を吸い込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza took a deep breath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――――恥知らず」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shameless."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………なんだと？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What did you say?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、何かほざいたのは誰だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who just uttered something?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲の魔物兵や捕まった人間が息を呑む中、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As the monster soldiers and captured humans around gasped,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザはまっすぐにツォトンを睨みつけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza glared straight at Zotton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「恥知らず、とそう言ったの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I said you are shameless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無抵抗の人たちを騙し討ちする事はできるのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can deceive and ambush unarmed people,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まともに戦う事もできないのね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but you can't even fight properly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何だと…………何を抜かすか、脆弱な人間が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What... what nonsense are you spouting, weak human!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンが蹴りつけた鉄格子がたわみ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The iron bars bent under Zotton's kick,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザの身体が牢屋ごと揺さぶられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shaking Urza along with the entire cell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……臆病者。それともコンプレックスでもあるの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Coward. Or do you have a complex or something?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一生懸命賢いフリをして、大変ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying hard to pretend you're smart, how exhausting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭の出来のせいでいじめられでもしたのかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Were you bullied because of your brain capacity, perhaps?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黙れ、ニイハオの欠片もないゴミクズが！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shut up, you worthless trash with not a scrap of 'Nihao'!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様のような無駄知恵が回る猿が一番腹が立つ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the cunning monkeys like you who irritate me the most!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 叩きつけるように吐き捨てた後で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He spat out his words harshly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンの唇が歪んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Zotton's lips twisted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……だがな、すぐにそんな者もいなくなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...But soon, even those like you will be gone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の理想が叶えばな……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If my ideal is fulfilled...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「理想…………？　何をしようというの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Your ideal...? What are you trying to do?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「品種改良だよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Breeding improvement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 端的に言って、ツォトンはせせら笑う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To put it simply, Zotton sneered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知能の低い人間同士を掛け合わせ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mating humans with low intelligence,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭が回る者は殺す。しばらく繰り返せば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: killing off the clever ones. Repeating this for some time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間とは逆らう能もない家畜動物の名前となる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they will become livestock who have no means to resist humans."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼスには自由の代わりに平等をくれてやるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To Zeth, I will give equality instead of freedom.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰もが等しく奴隷だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone will equally be slaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハハ、ワハハハハハハハハハ！！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha ha, wah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ――――ふざけないで！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-Don't joke around!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は大真面目だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm deadly serious."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can deceive and ambush unarmed people,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but you can't even fight properly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何だと…………何を抜かすか、脆弱な人間が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What... what nonsense are you spouting, weak human!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンが蹴りつけた鉄格子がたわみ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The iron bars bent under Zotton's kick,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザの身体が牢屋ごと揺さぶられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shaking Urza along with the entire cell.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Coward. Or do you have a complex or something?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一生懸命賢いフリをして、大変ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying hard to pretend you're smart, how exhausting.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Were you bullied because of your brain capacity, perhaps?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黙れ、ニイハオの欠片もないゴミクズが！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shut up, you worthless trash with not a scrap of 'Nihao'!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様のような無駄知恵が回る猿が一番腹が立つ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the cunning monkeys like you who irritate me the most!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 叩きつけるように吐き捨てた後で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He spat out his words harshly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンの唇が歪んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Zotton's lips twisted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……だがな、すぐにそんな者もいなくなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...But soon, even those like you will be gone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の理想が叶えばな……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If my ideal is fulfilled...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「理想…………？　何をしようというの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Your ideal...? What are you trying to do?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「品種改良だよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Breeding improvement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 端的に言って、ツォトンはせせら笑う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To put it simply, Zotton sneered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知能の低い人間同士を掛け合わせ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mating humans with low intelligence,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭が回る者は殺す。しばらく繰り返せば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: killing off the clever ones. Repeating this for some time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間とは逆らう能もない家畜動物の名前となる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they will become livestock who have no means to resist humans."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼスには自由の代わりに平等をくれてやるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To Zeth, I will give equality instead of freedom.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰もが等しく奴隷だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone will equally be slaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハハ、ワハハハハハハハハハ！！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha ha, wah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ――――ふざけないで！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D-Don't joke around!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は大真面目だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm deadly serious."
